LanguageData.MadSkills_RetentionHoursTip: RimWorld default value: 0 Pawn will stop losing skill XP in given hours after learning that skill.
LanguageData.MadSkills_DailyXPSaturationThresholdTip: RimWorld default value: 4000 After this amount of XP is earned in a skill, all subsequent learning of it is multiplied by value below, until midnight.
LanguageData.MadSkills_SaturatedXPMultiplierTip: RimWorld default value: 20% Multiplies XP gained in a skill which has already advanced the above amount that day. Set to 100% to disable daily XP limit altogether.
LanguageData.MadSkills_MultiplierTip: RimWorld default value: 100% Value to multiply default skill XP decay potency by. 0% for none, 50% for half, 200% for double, etc.
LanguageData.MadSkills_TieredTip: RimWorld default value: off Prevents skills from going down a level; XP to next level decays as per multiplier setting.
LanguageData.MadSkills_SleepStopDecayingTip: RimWorld default value: off Only awaken pawn will lose their skill XP.
LanguageData.MadSkills_AlternativeGreatMemoryDescript: {PAWN_nameDef} has a fantastic memory for detail. {PAWN_pronoun} will learn new skills slightly faster than other people.
LanguageData.MadSkills_AlterGreatMemoryTip: RimWorld default value: off Changes behavior of "great memory" trait: instead of halving skill decay rate it will now increase learning rate by 25%.
